activities:
DGI, LLC is a background screening and corporate due diligence company. DGI, LLC is a wholesale provider of information to retail background screening companies.
Certain candidate personal information is sent to, and received from, the EU as part of the background screening process.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data is received and sent by email. Data is manually processed by DGI employees who have been approproately screened and have signed legally binding privacy agreements.
recoursemech: DGI, LLC policy is to reply to complaint inquiries within the hour and resolve disputes within 3 business days. DGI, LLC has selected the E.U. Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) as it’s independent recourse mechanism for dispute resolution.
